items.title: My brother’s ‘good daughter’ siphoned $70,000 from her father’s accounts. Should she still get an inheritance?
items.description: “He has a large old house, valued at about $170,000, and many valuable antiques. I will be the executor of his estate.”

items.title: ‘You never know what might happen’: How do I make sure my son-in-law doesn’t get his hands on my daughter’s inheritance?
items.description: “So far, my daughter and her husband have a solid marriage.”

items.title: It’s my dream to travel to Africa. Can I pay for my husband’s trip without commingling our finances?
items.description: “Should I save the money in case we eventually split up?”

items.title: Consumer confidence rebounds in May on easing of U.S.-China tensions
items.description: The consumer confidence index jumped to 98 in May from a revised 85.7 in the prior month, the Conference Board said Tuesday, the first gain after five...
